results.name: Triangle A072768 computed modulo 2.
comment: Differs from A071674 first time at the position n=37, where A072770(37) = 0, while A071674(37) = 1.
The term a(0)=0 is not explicitly listed here as to get a better looking triangle.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 12 2002
